channel.title: Blog de Felipe Daffunchio
channel.description: Contenido reciente de Blog de Felipe Daffunchio

item.description:
Blog designed for publishing my articles, which will be about areas of my interest, those ones can be located in research fields like:

  • Armed conflicts (recruitment, composition, logistic, tactics and its consecuenses)
  • Economy (Inflations and Hyperinflations all around diferent times and geographic locations)
  • Policie (party dynamics, party systems, Goverment and politic economy)
  • Historiography

Another areas of interest outside or related with the articles:

  • Music
  • Philosophy
  • Psicology
  • Pedagogy
  • Blacksmith
  • Humor

If you are interested in contacting me, you can do it through my e-mail address:
